(adj) rộng rãi
- (Especially of a room or building) having ample space

(adj)
of or inside a particular country; not foreign or international
Eg: domestic flights (= to and from places within a country)

(adj) ngoài, từ ngoài vào, nước ngoài

(adj)

(adj) 
- In or according to styles or types no longer current; not modern.
(adj) hoa mỹ, trang trí công phu

(v) hoạt hóa, khởi động
- Make (something) active or operative
eg: fumes from cooking are enough to activate the alarm

(v) judge a building not to be safe
eg: No one has been allowed to occupy

(v) lên kế hoạch, phát minh, sáng chế

eg: a training programme should be devised
eg: a complicated game of his own devising

(v) đẩy, kéo mạnh

(v) kéo lên (cờ), nhấc bổng lên
